content:
By Meghan Budden  • The Cardinal Contributing Writer

Before you hit checkout on your Amazon cart, have you considered hitting up or donating to a local thrift shop? Check out some of our favorite secondhand finds and send us yours to be featured at Jess@doylestowncardinal.com with a picture, price, and where you found it. 

Second-Hand Find: Blue and White Ceramic Plates, Serving Ware, Pitchers, and Basket

Second-Hand Price: $15

Retails new for: approximately $75

Where: Liberty Thrift

Mission: Proceeds go towards Liberty House, Ann’s House, and Pennsburg House, which are homes to individuals recently released from prison, who enroll in a twelve-month educational and discipleship program. See location, hours, and more info at libertythriftstores.com

Deal Days: Weekly sales on colored tags and categories such as electronics, jewelry, shoes, etc.

Second-Hand Find: Vintage 1970s Ceramic Peacock

Second-Hand Thrift Price: $30

Retails on Ebay for $139.99

Where: Four Paws Thrift in Warrington

Mission: Proceeds go to the care and placement of cats in need. See hours and more info at cattalesinc.org

Special Deals: Half off everything, every day. Clearance corner with items as low as 10 cents. 

Second-Hand Find: Assortment of Copper Decor

Second-Hand Price: $20

Retails new for: Approximately $50

Where: Good Stuff Thrift in Buckingham

Mission: Proceeds help kids in need in our community. See hours, locations and more info at goodstuffthrift.org

Special Deals: 50% off Color Tag of the Week Sale and Double Point Mondays

Second-Hand Find: Disney Store Satin Princess Shoes

Second-Hand Price: $2

Retails new for: $24.99

Where: Worthwhile Thrift in Plumsteadville

Mission: Proceeds support survivors of human trafficking. See locations, hours, and more info at worthwhilewear.org

Special Deals: 50% off the entire store on the third  Thursday and first Saturday of every month. 

Second-Hand Find: Fourth of July Decor

Second-Hand Price: $5 

Retails new for: approximately $20

Where: NOVA Thrift Shop in Perkasie 

Mission: Proceeds help provide free and confidential support for victims of crime in Bucks County. See locations, hours, and more info at novabucks.org

Deal Days: Fill a basket with any items from the Bargain Cove for $10 on Tues, Thurs, and Sat. 

Second-Hand Find: Women’s Boden Dress

Second-Hand Price: $2

Retails new for: $80

Where: Goodwill in Montgomeryville

Mission: Proceeds help people with barriers to employment, build skills, find jobs, and grow their careers. See hours, locations, and more info at yourgoodwill.org

Special Deal Days: Color Tag Sale with 50% off select items Wed-Mon and $2 Color Tag Tuesdays
